data.title: "Project RX": The Development of the Focus RS Coming Soon
data.tags: Ford Focus RS RX, rallycross, motorsport, rally, Focus RS
data.description: Go behind the scenes of the Ford Focus RS RX development with the "Project RX" documentary series.

asset.title: "Project RX": The Development of the Focus RS Coming Soon
asset.description: Go behind the scenes of the Ford Focus RS RX development with the "Project RX" documentary series.
asset.author: Ford Performance

data.title: Project RX Episode 1: Design and Development
data.tags: Ford Focus RS RX, rallycross, motorsport, rally, Focus RS, Ken Block
data.description: The Ford Focus RS RX was designed to be the ultimate rallycross vehicle.  Take a look at the process that Ford Performance engineers, M-Sport, and Hoonigan Racing Division drivers Ken Block and Andreas Bakkerud went through to get the vehicle optimized in both performance and design.

asset.title: Project RX Episode 1: Design and Development
asset.description: The Ford Focus RS RX was designed to be the ultimate rallycross vehicle.  Take a look at the process that Ford Performance engineers, M-Sport, and Hoonigan Racing Division drivers Ken Block and Andreas Bakkerud went through to get the vehicle optimized in both performance and design.
asset.author: Ford Performance

data.title: Shakedown & Expectations (Episode 4) | Project RX | FORD PERFORMANCE
data.tags: Ford Focus RS RX, rallycross, motorsport, rally, Ken Block
data.description: The final episode of "Project RX" highlights the team's first test of the vehicle, how Ken Block and Andreas Bakkerud's liveries were placed, and the team's expectations for the season.  In only four races, Hoonigan Racing Division and the Focus RS RX have already earned one podium finish, and three Final appearances!

asset.title: Shakedown & Expectations (Episode 4) | Project RX | FORD PERFORMANCE
asset.description:
The final episode of "Project RX" highlights the team's first test of the vehicle, how Ken Block and Andreas Bakkerud's liveries were placed, and the team's expectations for the season.  In only four races, Hoonigan Racing Division and the Focus RS RX have already earned one podium finish, and three Final appearances!

Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTbkV5qzFkTwNOefKAT55N32XpVW6GAuv
asset.author: Ford Performance

data.title: Ford Feels the Heat at the Nürburgring (World Endurance Championship) | FORD PERFORMANCE
data.tags: Ford GT, World Endurance Championship, Ford Performance, Nurburgring, WEC, Ford GT racing
data.description: The Ford Chip Ganassi Racing team had a tough weekend at the Nürburgring and ultimately had to settle for fourth place for the #66 Ford GT of Stefan Mücke and Olivier Pla and seventh for the #67 car of Marino Franchitti, Andy Priaulx and Harry Tincknell. Here’s how the race unfolded.

asset.title: Ford Feels the Heat at the Nürburgring (World Endurance Championship) | FORD PERFORMANCE
asset.description:
The Ford Chip Ganassi Racing team had a tough weekend at the Nürburgring and ultimately had to settle for fourth place for the #66 Ford GT of Stefan Mücke and Olivier Pla and seventh for the #67 car of Marino Franchitti, Andy Priaulx and Harry Tincknell. Here’s how the race unfolded.
